restlib.net

Class UriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.net.IRIBuilder
      • restlib.net.UriBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class UriBuilder
extends IRIBuilder
    A builder for generating syntatically valid URIs. UriBuilder instances can be reused; it is safe to call build() multiple times to build multiple URIs.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the Uri instance that would be generated by this builder is not a syntactically valid URI.
